snippet: Mr. Kelley’s art mined the abjection and gross-out anarchy associated with youth culture.
abstract: Mike Kelley, one of the most influential American artists of the past quarter century and a pungent commentator on American class, dies at age 57.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Kelley’s art mined the abjection and gross-out anarchy associated with youth culture.

headline.seo: Mike Kelley, Influential American Artist, Dies at 57
headline.main: Mike Kelley, an Artist With Attitude, Dies at 57
headline.print_headline: Mike Kelley, an Artist With Attitude, Dies at 57
